DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see whether HLA-mismatched donor cells infusion with chemotherapy (microtransplantation，MST) could increase complete remission (CR) and improve survival in older patients with acute myeloid leukemia (AML)，the investigators conducted a prospective, multicenter clinical trial of HLA-mismatched MST to estimate outcomes and toxicities.
DOC.brief_title: Microtransplantation in Older Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.criteria: de novo acute myeloid leukemia age 6090 have HLA mismatched donor have no suitable donor or donor refused patient refused to accept donor cells
